name: Mein neues Leben: Abenteuer auf Tropicana
overview: Start your whole new life as an immigrant on Tropicana Island! You can make it from a laborer to the top in 90 days and see your dwelling grow from a derelict shack to a luxury mansion. You don't have to enjoy the fruits of your labor alone: Get to know your dream partner at Tropicana and court him until you both become an inseparable couple. Adjust to your new life in tropical regions and don't be too surprised if you hear about a secret pirate treasure that no one has found yet. Maybe you're lucky and spot it? Play as man or woman and determine your appearance by composing clothes and accessories according to your taste. In nine different island regions you can freely explore the surroundings. Learn one of six professions and face the job interviews. Rent and buy a property that suits your needs. Experience the game of the successful show on Kabel1!
